resources.string: God, choose for me what is best in all matters of my life, then please me with your choice
I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
In the name of God, whose name does not harm anything on the earth or in heaven, and He is the All-Knowing.
Oh God, I ask you with your mercy, which envelopes everything to forgive me.
Allah is my suffice, and the best deputy.
Oh Allah, Grant Health to my body, Oh Allah Grant health to my hearing, Oh Allah, Grant health to my sight.
O God save me from impotence, laziness, immorality, and infidelity, and grant me Paradise without punishment.

O God, I ask you the best of what your Prophet Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allaah be upon him) asked you, and we seek refuge in you from the evil of what your Prophet Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allaah be upon him).
